text: Mwalembetsa kale mu kaundula wa COVID-19.
Takulandilani gawo la COVID-19 lolembetsera nokha. Chonde lembani dzina lanu.

Kodi ndinu wamwamuna kapena wamkazi?
1. Mwamuna 
2. Mkazi
Kodi munabadwa liti? Gwiritsani ntchito DD/MM/YYYY i.e. 20/04/1990.
Gwiritsani ntchito DD/MM/YYYY-10/12/1990 Kapena YYYY-MM-DD- 1990-12-10.
Ku Malawi kulibe boma la @results.district. Chonde lembaninso molondola boma lomwe mukuchokera ndipo mu tumizenso.
Kodi adilesi yanu ndi chiyani? Mutha kutchula chizindikiro chapafupi ngati chilipo.

Kodi dziko lanu ndi liti?
Yankhani ndi 1 kapena M wa Malawi. Kupanda kutero, chonde nenani.
Zikomo, @results.name polembetsa. Tikutsatirani pazotsatira ndi zizindikiro zilizonse m'masiku 14 otsatira kuti muwonetsetse thanzi lanu.  Kuchokera ku Unduna wa Zaumoyo.

actions.text:
Welcome to the COVID-19 self-registration module.
Please respond with your name.
You have already registered for COVID-19 followup.

What is your gender? 
1. Male
2. Female
What is your date of birth? Use DD/MM/YYYY format e.g 20/04/1990

Wrong date of birth format. Please use DD/MM/YYYY format for the date. E.g 10/12/1990.
You can also use YYYY-MM-DD. Eg 1990-12-10
Which district are you from?
District @results.district not recognized. Please check your spelling and resubmit.
What is your physical address? You may specify the nearest feature or landmark if any.
What is your nationality? Respond with 1 or M for Malawian. Otherwise, please specify.
Thank you, @results.name for registering. We shall follow you up for any signs and symptoms in the next 14 days to monitor your health. Ministry of Health.

actions.body:
@(json(object(
  "contact", object(
    "uuid", contact.uuid, 
    "name", contact.name, 
    "urn", contact.urn
  ),
  "flow", object(
    "uuid", run.flow.uuid, 
    "name", run.flow.name
  ),
  "results", foreach_value(results, extract_object, "value", "category")
)))

actions.text: There is a temporary system challenge

text:
Chonde tiwuzeni chifukwa chomwe mukufuna kusiyira kutsatira kwa COVID-19.
1. Wotsimikizika opanda COVID-19
2. Kukhazikika kwatha
3. Zina, chonde tchulani
Zikomo pogwiritsira ntchito ndondomekoyi, kumbukilani kusamba manja ndi sopo, valani chotetezela kukamwa ndi mphuno  ndipo muzikhala motalikilana ndi anzanu kuti mupewe matenda a Covid-19

actions.text:
Please let us know why you want to stop COVID-19 follow-up.
1. Confirmed Negative
2. Quarantine ended
3. Other, please specify
Thank you for using the COVID-19 follow up system, please remember to wash your hands, wear a mask when going out and practice social distancing to combat the spread of Covid-19

text: Tumizani nambala ya munthu amene wapezeka ndi matenda  a COVID19
Mwapereka nambala iyi @results.phone kuti mwini wake ali ndi matenda a COVID19. Tumizani Inde ngati nambala ili yolondola kapena Ayi ngati ili yolakwika
Mwapereka nambala yolakwika (@results.phone).
Mwapezeka ndi matenda a COVID19.
Zikomo pogwiritsira ntchito ndondomekoyi, kumbukilani kusamba manja ndi sopo, valani chotetezela kukamwa ndi mphuno  ndipo muzikhala motalikilana ndi anzanu kuti mupewe matenda a Covid-19
Zikomo pogwiritsira ntchito ndondomekoyi, kumbukilani kusamba manja ndi sopo, valani chotetezela kukamwa ndi mphuno  ndipo muzikhala motalikilana ndi anzanu kuti mupewe matenda a Covid-19

actions.text: You have reported user with phone number @results.phone as a confirmed COVID-19 case. Is that the correct number for the case? Answer Yes or No
Please respond with the phone number for the confirmed case.
You provided an invalid phone number (@results.phone).
Thank you for using this service. , please remember to wash your hands with soap, wear a mask when going out and practice social distancing to combat the spread of Covid-19

text:
Takulandilani purogalamu yotsatira ya COVID-19
1. Lembetsani
2. Zizindikiro zanga.
3. Chiwerengero cha Malawi
4. Chiwerengero cha dziko lonse lapansi
5. Lekani

Mwapereka kale zizindikiro  zanu lero. Ngati pali chovuta/choopsa, chonde lemberani MoH. Zikomo pogwiritsira ntchito ndondomekoyi, kumbukilani kusamba manja ndi sopo, valani chotetezela kukamwa ndi mphuno  ndipo muzikhala motalikilana ndi anzanu kuti mupewe matenda a Covid-19

Chiwerengero cha Dziko lonse la pansi: 
Apezeka Nako Kumene: @webhook.NewConfirmed 
Afa Nako Kumene: @webhook.NewDeaths 
Achira Kumene: @webhook.NewRecovered 
Onse Apezeka Nako: @webhook.TotalConfirmed 
Onse Afa Nako : @webhook.TotalDeaths Onse Achira: @webhook.TotalRecovered

Chiwerengero cha Malawi: 
Apezeka Nako Kumene: @webhook.NewConfirmed 
Afa Nako Kumene: @webhook.NewDeaths 
Achira Kumene: @webhook.NewRecovered 
Onse Apezeka Nako: @webhook.TotalConfirmed 
Onse Afa Nako : @webhook.TotalDeaths 
Onse Achira: @webhook.TotalRecovered

actions.text:
Welcome to the COVID-19 follow up system, choose your preferred Language 
(Takulandilani ku ndondomeko yotsatira umoyo wanu malinga ndi mulili wa COVID-19. Sankhani chilankhulo chomwe mukufuna)?
1. English
2. Chichewa

COVID-19 follow up system menu.
1. Register
2. My Symptoms
3. Malawi Stats
4. Global Stats
5. STOP

You already reported your symptoms today. If it is an emergency, please contact the MoH.

Thank you for using this service. Please remember to wash your hands with soap, wear a mask when going out and practice social distancing to combat the spread of Covid-19

Global Stats:
New Confirmed: @webhook.NewConfirmed
New Deaths: @webhook.NewDeaths
New Recovered: @webhook.NewRecovered
Total Confirmed: @webhook.TotalConfirmed
Total Deaths: @webhook.TotalDeaths
Total Recovered: @webhook.TotalRecovered

Malawi Stats:
Confirmed Cases: @webhook.numberOfConfirmedCases
Confirmed Deaths: @webhook.numberOfConfirmedDeaths
Recovered: @webhook.numberOfRecoveredPatients
Suspected Cases: @webhook.numberOfSuspectedCases
Received Samples: @webhook.numberOfReceivedSamples
Tested Sampled: @webhook.numberOfTestedSamples

text:
Kodi muli ndi chifuwa chowuma?
1. Inde
2. Ayi
Chonde yankhani Inde ngati muli ndi chifuwa chopanda makhololo. Ayi, ngati simutero.

Kodi mukuvutika kupuma?
1. Inde
2. Ayi
Chonde yankhani Inde ngati mukuvutika kupuma. Ayi, ngati simutero.

Kodi mukutentha thupi?
1. Inde
2. Ayi
